Labs

Labs associated with the Molecular Programming Project.

Core MMP Labs

  • Jehoshua “Shuki” Bruck: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for education - courses)
  • Shawn Douglas: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for education - student competitions) [regional director]
  • Eric Klavins: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for education - undergraduate research) [regional director]
  • Richard Murray: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for outreach - diversity)
  • Niles Pierce: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for knowledge transfer - software and wetware)
  • Lulu Qian: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for outreach - general public)
  • Paul Rothemund: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for knowledge transfer - mini-workshops, tutorials, and support)
  • Georg Seelig: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for knowledge transfer - web resources)
  • William Shih: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for knowledge transfer - industrial contacts) [regional director]
  • Erik Winfree: Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for knowledge transfer - annual workshops) [director]
  • Peng Yin : Personal Page and Group Page (facilitator for knowledge transfer - affiliates)
